name: Rangda, Demon Lord Of Witches
resist: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
text: If Rangda fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Rangda has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The rangda, demon lord of witches's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: charm person, comprehend languages, eldritch blast (4d10), fly, mage hand, vicious mockery (4d4)
3/day each: bestow curse (8 hours), blight, counterspell, major image, remove curse, tongues, witch bolt (5d12)
1/day each: feeblemind, plane shift, true polymorph

action.name: Multiattack
text: Rangda makes three attacks. two with her claws and one with her tongue lash.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or become infected with cackle fever. If the target succeeds, it is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

action.name: Tongue Lash
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or its Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

action.name: Hypnotic Sway (Recharge 5-6)
text: Rangda sways her body and tongue in a mesmerizing rhythm. Each creature of her choice that is within 30 feet of her that can see her must succeed on a DC 19 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Teleport
text: Rangda magically teleports to an unoccupied space within line of sight. Alternatively, Rangda magically enters her home plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

The fiend (demon) can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The fiend (demon) regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Options
text: Rangda can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Rangda regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Hypnotic Sway (Costs 2 Actions)
text: Rangda uses her Hypnotic Sway ability, if it is available.

spells: charm person, comprehend languages, eldritch blast, fly, mage hand, vicious mockery, bestow curse, blight, counterspell, major image, remove curse, tongues, witch bolt, feeblemind, plane shift, true polymorph
